tool_description: An API showing latest news of Mohamed Salah from many news websites
name: Mohamed Salah
title: Mohamed Salah

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get News about Mo Salah from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mohamed-salah.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mohamed-salah.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mohamed-salah.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mohamed-salah.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Mo Salah News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Mo Salah from many sports news pages
api_list.code:
